content.question: Which change, if any, can be made so that the code segment produces the intended output?

choices.label: In line 1, print should be changed to println.
The statement System.out.println() should be inserted between lines 2 and 3.
In lines 1, 2, and 3, the text that appears in parentheses should be enclosed in quotation marks.
No change is needed; the code segment works correctly as is.

content.answer: In lines 1, 2, and 3, the text that appears in parentheses should be enclosed in quotation marks.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
